headline.main: Campaign Recalls the Days Before Actions Against the Czechs and Poland; DRIVE IS HELD IMMINENT

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, April 2 -- The Yugoslav situation was said here today to be unchanged, with the Reich maintaining a position of observation toward Belgrade, although it was asserted that the anti-German tendencies in Belgrade were on the increase.

keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
